name: SS Odyssey
description:
Here on humanity’s most advanced space station, the impact of everything you do is multiplied by hundreds compared to on Earth. Working out makes you that much stronger, studying makes you that much smarter, and each discovery made here improves the lives of that many more people. But, time is going by much faster, so 5 years will have passed on earth by the time you return. What you choose to fit into your 42-hour stay is up to you. Just remember, you still need to take care of yourself while you’re up here.

Explore the ship by clicking and dragging to launch yourself in a direction. Press E to interact with various activities.

At the end of your stay, find out what you were able to achieve in the summary.

Programming by Ian Cowan and Jason Chen

Art by Nic Stepp, Chris Pau, and Ian

Music by Chris

Sounds by Chris and Ian
